text: Nescafé is a brand of instant coffee made by Nestlé. Instant coffee is a powder which is mixed with hot water to make coffee. There are several different products that have the name Nescafé. The name is a mix of the words "Nestlé" and "café".nestle.com Nescafé . Retrieved June 24, 2009. Nestlé's instant coffee product was introduced in Switzerland on April 1, 1938nestle.com Nestlé Beverages . Retrieved October 20, 2005. after being developed for seven years by Max Morgenthaler and Vernon Chapman. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Nestlé Category:Coffee
title: Nescafé
